dmca.title: Hansen's Puts The Squeeze On Contracts Resource
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

I write on behalf of Hansen Beverage Company ( Hansen ).  Hansen recently learned that Onecle, Inc. posted, without Hansen s knowledge or consent, and apparently without any other authorization, an Aseptic Packaging Agreement between Hansen and Johanna Foods, Inc. (the  Agreement ) as a sample contract on its website.  The following URL provides access to the Agreement:

http://contracts.onecle.com/hansen/johanna.mfg.2000.12.07.shtml

This letter serves as Hansen s notification to Onecle, Inc. under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ( DMCA ) that Onecle, Inc. is infringing on Hansen s copyrights.  Hansen hereby requests that Onecle, Inc. remove and disable access to the Agreement from its website and refrain from posting any similar material on its website in the future.

Hansen has a good faith belief that use of the Agreement in the manner described above is not authorized by Hansen, its agent, or the law.  I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Hansen in this regard.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation.

Very truly yours,
[Private]
[Private]
Hansen Beverage Company
